must_have: Text notification when ready for pickup
Ability to track order status online
nice_to_have: Specify a preferred pickup time to avoid waiting
Indicate preferences for generic versus brand-name medications
Set a reminder for when to take my medication after refilling
Request a larger supply to last for three months instead of one
deal_breakers: Change in health condition affecting medication need
Prescription not filled correctly last time

technical: I think I need an online tracking system but I'm not sure how it works
Maybe a mobile app or something like that
non_technical: Good communication from the pharmacy about my prescription status
I heard friendly staff is important but I'm not sure why
A clear process for refills, whatever that means

must_meet: Prescription needs to be ready at some point
I want updates but not too many, I guess
should_meet: Should have some way to know when it's ready, like a text or a call
Possibly a way to pick it up at a specific time, if that’s possible
nice_to_meet: I would like to have reminders for my medication but I’m not certain how that works
It would be nice if they had some option for a three-month supply, whatever that means
